statements: SELECT * FROM water_usage_data;
SELECT customer_name, water_usage_gallons FROM water_usage_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_address, reading_date FROM water_usage_data ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM water_usage_data WHERE water_meter_id IN (123, 456);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, water_usage_gallons FROM water_usage_data WHERE reading_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, water_usage_gallons FROM water_usage_data WHERE water_usage_gallons < 5000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address, reading_date FROM water_usage_data WHERE water_usage_gallons BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE customer_id = 101 AND reading_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(water_usage_gallons) AS total_usage FROM water_usage_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_usage > 10000;
SELECT AVG(water_usage_gallons) AS avg_usage, MAX(water_meter_id) AS highest_meter_id FROM water_usage_data WHERE reading_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address, city FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state='California';
SELECT customer_id, address, city, state FROM customers WHERE city='Chicago';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state='California';
SELECT name, address, city FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, address, city, state FROM customers WHERE city='New York' AND state='New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.name, u.usage_date, u.gallons_used FROM customers c INNER JOIN usage_data u ON c.customer_id = u.customer_id WHERE u.gallons_used > 100 ORDER BY u.usage_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM customers WHERE state='Texas';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_city FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = '1';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT meter_id, meter_location, customer_id FROM WaterMeter WHERE meter_location LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT usage_date, usage_gallons FROM WaterUsage WHERE usage_gallons > 100 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Customer.customer_address, WaterMeter.meter_location, WaterUsage.usage_date, WaterUsage.usage_gallons FROM Customer JOIN WaterMeter ON Customer.customer_id = WaterMeter.customer_id JOIN WaterUsage ON WaterMeter.meter_id = WaterUsage.meter_id

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Customer.customer_city, WaterUsage.usage_date, WaterUsage.usage_gallons FROM Customer JOIN WaterMeter ON Customer.customer_id = WaterMeter.customer_id JOIN WaterUsage ON WaterMeter.meter_id = WaterUsage.meter_id ORDER BY WaterUsage.usage_date DESC

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Customer.customer_address, WaterMeter.meter_location FROM Customer INNER JOIN WaterMeter ON Customer.customer_id = WaterMeter.customer_id WHERE WaterMeter.meter_location LIKE 'Main%'

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Customer.customer_city, WaterUsage.usage_gallons FROM Customer JOIN WaterMeter ON Customer.customer_id = WaterMeter.customer_id JOIN WaterUsage ON WaterMeter.meter_id = WaterUsage.meter_id WHERE WaterUsage.usage_gallons > 100

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Customer.customer_address, WaterMeter.meter_location, WaterUsage.usage_date, WaterUsage.usage_gallons FROM Customer, WaterMeter, WaterUsage WHERE Customer.customer_id = WaterMeter.customer_id AND WaterMeter.meter_id = WaterUsage.meter_id
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT customer_id, address, city, state FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM water_meters WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT m.meter_id, m.meter_location, u.usage_date, u.gallons_used FROM water_meters m JOIN water_usage u ON m.meter_id = u.meter_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, state FROM customers WHERE city='New York' AND state='NY';
SELECT customer_id, address, city FROM customers JOIN water_meters ON customers.customer_id = water_meters.customer_id WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT usage_date, gallons_used FROM water_usage WHERE gallons_used > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_analysis FROM usage_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE gallons_used > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount FROM Customer INNER JOIN Payment ON Customer.customer_id = Payment.customer_id WHERE amount >= 50;
SELECT bill_id, amount_due FROM Billing WHERE bill_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date FROM Customer JOIN Payment ON Customer.customer_id = Payment.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT(customer_name) AS Name, address AS Location FROM Customer WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(gallons_used) AS Total_Gallons FROM Customer JOIN WaterUsage ON Customer.customer_id = WaterUsage.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY Total_Gallons DESC;
